Package vista.proyectos

Class CreateProjectView

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
vista.proyectos.CreateProjectView
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class CreateProjectView
extends javax.swing.JPanel
Class that contains the components and functionalities to create a view for the creation of a social or infrastructural project
Author:
Cesar Ramirez Martinez
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • CreateProjectView

      public CreateProjectView()
      Constructor of CreateProjectView: Initializes all the attributes and puts them in the right places in the container of the window. It is mainly formed by two tabs, a cancel button and a cancel button. Each tab gives the user the option to create either a social project or a infrastructural one.

    • getCost

      public double getCost()
      Return the cost of the project the user has written.
      Returns:
      cost of the project or -1 in case there is nothing written or -2 in case the cost is less than or equal to 0.
